improvement_suggestions:

2. **Legend and Label Overhaul:** The legend is the biggest visual flaw. It must be completely fixed. Move the legend outside the plot area, for instance, to the right of the right-hand histogram, and ensure the text is rendered clearly without any overlap. The y-axis label for the right histogram (subplot (1,1)), 'Price Distribution', needs to be fixed so it is legible and properly oriented.
3. **Add Missing Titles:** Add a clear, overarching title to the entire figure (e.g., 'Flight Price vs. Duration by Airline'). Also, add a specific title to the right histogram (subplot (1,1)), such as 'Price Distribution', to match the title on the top histogram.
4. **Layout Adjustment:** Increase the spacing on the right side of the figure to create enough room for the right histogram, its labels, and a legible legend. This will resolve the current cramped appearance and overlap issues.
5. **Enhance Text Hierarchy:** Make the main title larger and bolder than the subplot titles and axis labels to establish a clear visual hierarchy.
